title: Enacts the crime of aggravated endangering the welfare of a child
summary: Establishes the crime of aggravated endangering the welfare of a child as a crime punishable as a class C felony; includes acting in a manner likely to be injurious to the mental, physical or moral welfare of a child and failure to exercise due diligence in the control of a child to prevent a child from being abused.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the crime of aggravated endangering the welfare of a child
